Ingredients.5: 2 medium russet potatoes, peeled and diced, or more to taste

Ingredients.10: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Heat 1/4 cup oil a large pot over medium heat. Add onion, celery, and bacon to hot oil; cook and stir until bacon fat renders and onion is translucent, about 5 minutes. Add potatoes and clam juice. Increase heat to medium-high and bring to a boil. Cook until potatoes are fork-tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Add clams and cook for 10 minutes more.

Directions.2: Meanwhile, combine remaining 1/4 cup oil and flour in a separate saucepan over medium heat. Stir until paste-like and light golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes. Gradually whisk in almond milk; cook and stir until mixture becomes a thick slurry, 6 to 7 minutes more.

Directions.3: Stir slurry into clam chowder until thickened. Season with salt and pepper; serve hot.
